title: How much money can I make with Autel MaxiSys Elite diagnostic tool? - Quora

response.answer_text: I work on cars at home on the side and use a scan tool similar to the Autel. It helps for sure but it really depends on how many cars you get on a consistent basis. I can tell you for sure you won’t be doing any diagnostic work if you don’t have a diagnostic tool. I can easily make $300+ in a few hours with that tool. If you want to learn how to use it, there are tons of Youtube videos on it and also on their site. I’d recommend a engine management class though so you’ll know what to do with all the information that the tool will give you. The tool won’t fix the car but it will provide you with the information needed to fix it.
